Articles.Content: Well, obviously, it's a bit late, but I never actually got around to introducing myself here. I'm a moderately-educated end-user (I can fiddle with .cfg's, but don't expect any new parts), and I like building simple, compact rockets. I like NovaSilisko's SIDR&SD pack, Sunday Punch's Wobbly Rockets pack, and my final stage almost always contains the Micro Tank and Engine, and the RocktCo Hidra Parachute (which is awesome). When I'm not playing KSP, I'm a (soon-to-be) junior in high school (year 11 of school), who plays several instruments, is interested in a career in engineering, and likes 2-string kites and road bicycles.
